sqlMap.select: /*noticeDAO.noticeList*/ SELECT INX , NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, IMG_1 ,INFO ,DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d')AS INSERT_DATE FROM NOTICE
/*noticeDAO.noticeSelect*/ SELECT INX, NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, IMG_1, INSERT_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE INX =#INX#
sqlMap.update: /*noticeDAO.noticeUpdate*/ UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #TITLE# ,CONTENT = #CONTENT# ,INSERT_DATE = NOW() ,IMG_1 = #IMG_1# WHERE INX = #INX#
/*noticeDAO.noticeInfoCount*/ UPDATE NOTICE SET INFO = INFO +1 WHERE INX = #INX#
